Dame Mary Archer was everyone's hero on the famous all-female team for the University Challenge Christmas special - AOL UK Entertainment

The teams were made up of alumni who&#039;ve since achieved distinction in their fields - including many well known faces - and it was the all-female St Anne&#039;s Oxford team who absolutely slayed.   (BBC\/Screenshot)   TV correspondent Jacky Rowland, art historian and broadcaster Dr Janina Ramirez, BBC News science correspondent Rebecca Morelle and chairman of the Science Museum Group Mary Archer walked over the Manchester team with 185 points to 55. The college was formerly a women&#039;s college but has been coeducational since 1979. That&#039;s some sort of #UniversityChallenge record even for an all women&#039;s college -- Mike ?? ???? (@mikebirty) December 19, 2016      5\/8 contestants on #UniversityChallenge are female - Brilliant representation! -- Roseanna (@roseannasale) December 19, 2016      The St Anne&#039;s Oxford team on #UniversityChallenge are slaying. Huge respect. -- Elf-is ? (@EllisReadss) December 19, 2016    Team captain Mary Archer was everyone&#039;s stand out contestant.   (BBC\/Screenshot)     Mary Archer is good. Very good #universitychallenge That team seem like they want this -- Fiji Diddy (@damobullimore) December 19, 2016      Archer is goals #UniversityChallenge -- Orla Hanratty (@OrlaAHanratty) December 19, 2016      Who&#039;d have thought it, I love Mary Archer! #UniversityChallenge -- Katy Greenwood (@katygreenwood) December 19, 2016    The Manchester team - including poet Simon Armitage, president of the Paralympic Committee Sir Philip Craven, journalist Sarfraz Manzoor and the Natural History Museums&#039;s Erica McAlister will probably be kicking themselves.   (BBC\/Screenshot)     Does Manchester&#039;s buzzer work? #UniversityChallenge -- Dave Quirk (@daviequirk) December 19, 2016      Are Manchester still on set or have they gone to the bar? #UniversityChallenge -- penny green (@pennygreen3) December 19, 2016      I hope Manchester have enjoyed their glasses of water...#UniversityChallenge -- Ashleigh (@Ashleighw13) December 19, 2016    But it really did put our post-university achievements into rather harsh perspective. Dame Mary Archer was everyone's hero on the famous all-female team for the University Challenge Christmas special




		    		      By PA
 19 Dec 2016, 21:48


Updated: 20 Dec 2016, 9:05



-




If there's anything to make you feel bad about not using your degree to its full potential it's the University Challenge Christmas special.The teams were made up of alumni who've since achieved distinction in their fields - including many well known faces - and it was the all-female St Anne's Oxford team who absolutely slayed.(BBC/Screenshot)TV correspondent Jacky Rowland, art historian and broadcaster Dr Janina Ramirez, BBC News science correspondent Rebecca Morelle and chairman of the Science Museum Group Mary Archer walked over the Manchester team with 185 points to 55. The college was formerly a women's college but has been coeducational since 1979.These women are slaying on #UniversityChallengepic.twitter.com/GZidYQF5BM-- Eve Alcock (@EveAlcock) December 19, 20164 women on the same team! That's some sort of #UniversityChallenge record even for an all women's college-- Mike ?? ???? (@mikebirty) December 19, 20165/8 contestants on #UniversityChallenge are female - Brilliant representation!-- Roseanna (@roseannasale) December 19, 2016The St Anne's Oxford team on #UniversityChallenge are slaying. Huge respect.
			$(document).ready(function() {
				var s = document.createElement("script");
				s.type = "text/javascript";
				s.src = "//delivery.vidible.tv/jsonp/pid=579a0d1888d2ff1b039656f2/564dfd34bbe5c146d4b33c86.js?m.channel=entertainment&amp;m.adminibar=true&amp;m.o2inline=inview";
				$("#579a0d1888d2ff1b039656f2").html($(s));
			});
	    -- Elf-is ? (@EllisReadss) December 19, 2016Team captain Mary Archer was everyone's stand out contestant.(BBC/Screenshot)Mary Archer is good. Very good #universitychallengeThat team seem like they want this-- Fiji Diddy (@damobullimore) December 19, 2016Archer is goals #UniversityChallenge-- Orla Hanratty (@OrlaAHanratty) December 19, 2016Who'd have thought it, I love Mary Archer! #UniversityChallenge-- Katy Greenwood (@katygreenwood) December 19, 2016The Manchester team - including poet Simon Armitage, president of the Paralympic Committee Sir Philip Craven, journalist Sarfraz Manzoor and the Natural History Museums's Erica McAlister will probably be kicking themselves.(BBC/Screenshot)Does Manchester's buzzer work? #UniversityChallenge-- Dave Quirk (@daviequirk) December 19, 2016Are Manchester still on set or have they gone to the bar? #UniversityChallenge-- penny green (@pennygreen3) December 19, 2016I hope Manchester have enjoyed their glasses of water...#UniversityChallenge-- Ashleigh (@Ashleighw13) December 19, 2016But it really did put our post-university achievements into rather harsh perspective.Listening to what these alumni have done makes me realise I've done naff all since leaving university #UniversityChallenge-- Jack Poynter (@JPoynter91) December 19, 2016

(function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
	  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
	  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.8&appId=183146218394780";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
	}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

window.twttr = (function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
	    t = window.twttr || {};
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return t;
	  js = d.createElement(s);
	  js.id = id;
	  js.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);

	  t._e = [];
	  t.ready = function(f) {
	    t._e.push(f);
	  };

	  return t;
	}(document, "script", "twitter-wjs"));

					ymlPvnId='aoluk';

			io_c3sd.taboola=io_c3sd.taboola||{};
			io_c3sd.taboola['pvn-id']=ymlPvnId;
		}
		if(typeof io_c3sd != "undefined" && typeof io_c3sd.taboola != 'undefined' && typeof io_c3sd.taboola["pvn-id"] === 'string')

			window._taboola = window._taboola || [];

				mode: 'thumbnails-a',

		position: relative;
		padding-bottom: 20px;
	}

		position: absolute !important;
		bottom: 0;
	}
	.trc_rbox_header_span {
		display:none;

	.video-label-box span {
		font-family: inherit !important;

	.module.mod-type-taboola .thumbnails-a .videoCube:hover .video-label-box .video-title {
		text-decoration: none !important;
		border-bottom: 1px solid #0179C7;
		color: #0179C7;
		display: inline;
	}

	    font-weight: 900;
	    letter-spacing: 1px;

	    color: #06f;
	    display: initial;
	}
	html#ttcobrand .module.mod-type-taboola {
		display: block !important;

(function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
	  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
	  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.8&appId=183146218394780";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
	}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));

window.twttr = (function(d, s, id) {
	  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
	    t = window.twttr || {};
	  if (d.getElementById(id)) return t;
	  js = d.createElement(s);
	  js.id = id;
	  js.src = "https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";
	  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);

	  t._e = [];
	  t.ready = function(f) {
	    t._e.push(f);
	  };

	  return t;
	}(document, "script", "twitter-wjs"));

(function(a){try{a("img[data-credit!=''][data-credit]:not(:hidden)").imageCredit({"show-default":"hover","show-touch":true,"show-narrow":false,narrow:767})}catch(err){}}(jQuery));





		var _stickyRRailWrapper = $('#rrail-modules-wrapper');_stickyRRailWrapper.length && _stickyRRailWrapper.StickyBTF({"boundaryElement": ".lo-left", "topOffset": 105, "bottomOffset": 20});
	







		(function($){
			$('.aol-newsletter').length && AOLUK.NewsLetterSignup("https://aol123.createsend.com/t/t/s/qjdllu/","cm-qjdllu-qjdllu");

$(function(){

    // Enable carousels generated by listpost
	$(".xd-carousel").length && $(".xd-carousel").each(function() {
	   $(this).xdCarousel($(this).data("carousel"));
    })

    // Apply programmatic responsive changes
    var _responsiveClassChanges = function() {
		$("[data-responsive]").each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            var responsiveSettings = $this.data("responsive");
            for(var matchingLayouts in responsiveSettings) {
                if(DI.currentLayout.match(new RegExp(matchingLayouts,"mig"))) {
                    $this.removeClass().addClass(responsiveSettings[matchingLayouts]);
                }
            }
        });
    }

    // Add device css class to body on change
    $body = $("body");
    DI.currentLayout = DI.activeLayout();
    $body.addClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
    _responsiveClassChanges(); // apply responsive changes on load
    // and listen for future layout changes
    $(window).resize(function() {
        if(DI.activeLayout()!= DI.currentLayout) {
            $body.removeClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
            DI.currentLayout = DI.activeLayout();
            $body.addClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
			_responsiveClassChanges();
        }
    })

    // Generic tab controls
    $('[data-tab-control]').each(function(){
        var $this = $(this);
        var $contentPages=$($this.data("tab-control"));
        $contentPages.addClass("tab-content");
        $tabs=$this.find("a");
        $tabs.click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            $tabs.removeClass("selected");
            $contentPages.removeClass("selected");
            $(this).addClass("selected");
            $contentPages.filter($(this).attr("href")).addClass("selected");
        });
    });

    // Taboola
	window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
	_taboola.push({flush: true});

});





!function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function()
{n.callMethod? n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)}
;if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
document,'script','https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
fbq('init', '1112906175403201'); // Insert your pixel ID here.
fbq('track', 'PageView');



 
(function($) {

	Array.prototype.getUnique=function(y){var x=1,t,r={},i=this.length,n=[];for(t=0;i>t;t+=1)r[this[t]]=this[t];for(t in r){n.push((y!==undefined&&((y==='i'&&x||y)+'|')||'')+r[t]);x++}return n};

	function dataLayerTracker() {

		var $allBeacons = $('[data-beacon][data-beacon^="{"][data-beacon$="}"]:not([data-ignore-for-vanity]):not(:hidden)'),
			has = 'hasOwnProperty',
			all_mnids = $allBeacons.map(function() {

				var beacon = $(this).data('beacon');
				beacon = typeof beacon === "object" && beacon || $.parseJSON(beacon);

				if (beacon[has]('p') && beacon['p'][has]('mnid') && $.trim(beacon['p']['mnid']) !== '') {
					return beacon['p']['mnid'];
				}
			}),
			dl_brand = io_c3sd && io_c3sd.omniture && io_c3sd.omniture.prop17 || "aoluk",
			dl_site = io_c3sd && io_c3sd.omniture && io_c3sd.omniture.prop21 || "portal";
			all_mnids = $.makeArray(all_mnids).getUnique(-77).join(',');

		bN_cfg = {
			h: [location.hostname],
			b: "b.aol.com",
			p: [
				["dL_ch", "uk.aolcoment"],
				["dL_dpt", "acm\x3A\x20article"],
				["dL_sDpt", "acm\x3A\x20main"],
								["dL_filedUnder", "tv"],
				["dL_tags", "celebrity\x2D\x26\x2Dshowbiz,featured,jeremy\x2Dpaxman,mary\x2Darcher,showbiz\x2Dfeatures,showbiz\x2Dtv,university\x2Dchallenge"],
								["dL_EU_brandType", dl_brand],
				["dL_EU_ClientvsPortal", dl_site],
				["dL_cmsID", "bsd\x3A21631176"],
				["cms_src", "eu-aol.com"],
				["template", "default.layout.twig"],
				["cobrand", "amp\x2Duk"],
				["plids", all_mnids, 1],
				["Custom04", (io_c3s && io_c3s.used_layout || 'desktop')]
			],
			upgradeIE: false
		};

		var getScript = typeof $.getJS === "function" && $.getJS || $.getScript;
		getScript('//s.aolcdn.com/os/aol/beacon.min.js', onBeaconLoad);
		
		//Creating multivariate tracking beacon
		function onBeaconLoad() {
			var plids = [], mvts = [];
			$('.mv-bN').each(function () {
				var beaconData = $(this).attr('data-beacon');
				if (beaconData !== '') {
					beaconData = JSON.parse(beaconData);
					if (beaconData.p && beaconData.p.plid && beaconData.p.mvt) {
						plids.push(beaconData.p.plid);
						mvts.push(beaconData.p.mvt);
					}
				}
			});
			if (mvts.length > 0) {
				bN.set('plids', plids.join(';'), true);
				bN.set('mvts', mvts.join(';'), true);
				bN.ping('mlt');
			}
		};
	}
	$(document).ready(function() {
		dataLayerTracker();
	});

}(jQuery));
 

{"isEnabled":true}
